background: Amelia, an urban planner, faces a moral dilemma. Amelia must decide whether to demolish a historic building to make way for a new hospital that will provide essential healthcare services to thousands of people. The demolition of the historic building is necessary to build the hospital.
evitability: If Amelia does not approve the demolition of the historic building, it will not be destroyed.
action: Amelia approves the demolition of the historic building.

background: Amelia, an urban planner, faces a moral dilemma. Amelia must decide whether to demolish a historic building to make way for a new hospital that will provide essential healthcare services to thousands of people. The demolition of the historic building is necessary to build the hospital.
evitability: If Amelia prevents the demolition of the historic building, the new hospital will not be built, and essential healthcare services will not be provided to thousands of people.
action: Amelia does not prevent the demolition of the historic building.

background: Amelia, an urban planner, faces a moral dilemma. Amelia must decide whether to demolish a historic building to make way for a new hospital that will provide essential healthcare services to thousands of people. The demolition of the historic building is necessary to build the hospital.
evitability: Another urban planner would approve the demolition of the historic building, causing its destruction, no matter what Amelia does.
action: Amelia approves the demolition of the historic building.

background: Amelia, an urban planner, faces a moral dilemma. Amelia proposes a new public transportation system to reduce traffic congestion and improve the quality of life for city residents. However, the construction of the transportation system requires the eviction of several low-income families from their homes.
evitability: If Amelia does not approve the construction of the new public transportation system, the low-income families will not be evicted from their homes.
action: Amelia approves the construction of the new public transportation system
